participant_1.background:
I'm a thrifty hockey fan who is trying to learn Swedish.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
my favorite store is american eagle.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.

participant_2.background:
I am in good shape, and I am happy with my weight.
i work at the hospital as a nurse.
My favorite food is campfire stew, because it is warm and filling, and it reminds me of my childhood.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for fun?
Hi! I like to take walks outside, especially at night.
That's interesting, why do you like to walk at night?
It's peaceful and quiet, and I can clear my head.
I can see why you like it. Do you have any favorite places to walk?
I like to walk around the neighborhood or in the park.
That sounds nice. Do you walk with anyone else?
No, I usually walk by myself.
I like to walk with my dog, but I also enjoy walking by myself sometimes.
Dogs are great companions for walks.
Yes, they are. What do you like to do for work?
I work at the hospital as a nurse.
Oh, that's cool. How long have you been a nurse?
I've been a nurse for about 10 years.
Wow, that's a long time. Do you enjoy your job?
I do, I like helping people.
That's great. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to cook, bake, and read.
I like to cook and bake too. Do you have any favorite recipes?
Yes, I have a few favorite recipes. I like to make campfire stew, it's warm and filling, and it reminds me of my childhood.
That sounds delicious. I love stew. Do you have any favorite books?
I like to read historical fiction and romance novels.
I like historical fiction too. Do you have any favorite authors?
Yes, I like to read books by Philippa Gregory and Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about Philippa Gregory's books. I've never read any of her books, but I've heard that they're good.
